about.title: Welcome to Phoenix Gym 365
about.description: Phoenix Gym 365 is a modern gym with over 10 years of experience. Our goal is to provide you with the best training conditions and professional trainer support to help you achieve your fitness goals.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals

gym.title: Gym Space
gym.desc: Modern equipment for all types of training

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.desc: Access to the gym at any time

bmi.subtitle: Calculate BMI, ideal weight and daily calories
bmi.enterToCalculate: Enter all data for detailed results

testimonials.title: What Our Members Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories, real results
testimonials.boba: Phoenix Gym has changed my life! The atmosphere is incredible, the equipment is modern, and the trainers are always there to help. In one year I completely transformed my body and have never been in better shape.
testimonials.sergej: As a trainer at Phoenix Gym, I'm proud to work with motivated people who want to achieve their goals. We have a great team and excellent equipment that allows us to deliver the best results.
testimonials.dubravko: Phoenix Gym 365 is not just a gym, it's a family. I've been working here for several years and every day I see our members achieve incredible results. It motivates me to be a better trainer.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? Send us a message and we'll get back to you soon
contact.description: Our team is here to answer all your questions about memberships, training and services we offer.
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

home.title: Phoenix Gym 365 - Modern Gym
